document.full_text: ailing car maker saab has lined up almost 60 million euros ($88.9 million) in funds to get production started again after a month of stoppage, its dutch owner spyker said on monday.
document.title: crisis-hit saab finds funds, hopes to start output
lines_and_colors: ailing car maker saab has lined up almost 60 million euros ($88.9 million) in funds to get production started again after a month of stoppage, its dutch owner spyker said on monday.
